hat cuff with 4mm/us 6 35cm flat or 40 cm circular needles cast on 138 sts using the long tail method work the honeycomb cuff by repeating the following 8 row a total of 5 times shown in chart a1 on page 8 row 1 rs p1 p2 k4 p2 repeat 17 times until 1 st remains p1 row 2 ws k1 k2 p4 k2 repeat 17 times until 1 st remains k1 row 3 rs p1 t4b t4f repeat 17 times until 1 st remains p1 row 4 ws k1 p2 k4 p2 repeat 17 times until 1 st remains k1 row 5 rs p1 k2 p4 k2 repeat 17 times until 1 st remains p1 row 6 ws same as row 4 row 7 rs p1 t4f t4b repeat 17 times until 1 st remains p1 row 8 ws same as row 2 © anouskaknits 2025 3 honey & salt hat september 2025 work row 1-3 again your work should measure approx 15 cm from the cast-on edge this completes the cuff section size up to 4 5mm/us 7 35cm flat or 40 cm circular needles to decrease by a total of 16 sts as follows decrease row ws k1 p6 p2tog repeat 16 times p8 k1 you have 122 sts salt cable -
